column2: "How's it going? Are you doing Well? If not I have energy to spare for the both of us!"
"Having too much motivation can cause you to run around in circles, but I think it's better than none at all."
"It's just that my ARKS friend has no motivation what so ever. It's pathetic just looking at him."
"If it were possible I'd like to switch places with him."
"But since it's not, I'll just have to become part of the ARKS office staff and support in anyway I can."
"I need to pass the qualification test, which in itself is a challenge."
"I've decided to take it so all I can do is try my best. I want to show that working hard beats having ability."
